item.title: Recommended Settings
item.description: Please make sure to update the firmware on your device as you get started. The easiest way to do that is to use the Web Flasher. The latest stable release, even if labeled Beta, is generally a very safe option. In the Bay Area, we have a few recommendations for configuration: LORA Set region to United States (US) Preset: Long Range - Fast (Default) Number of hops: 3 (Default) - Please don’t turn this up.
